item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Near-zero-downtime maintenance in Azure Database for MySQL
item.description:
Azure Database for MySQL â€“ Flexible Server with High Availability (HA) now offers near-zero-downtime maintenance and this capability is generally available. The feature is supported by a new HA architecture and applies to Flexible Server deployments with HA enabled.

  • Source: Azure Updates
